game.name: CONFINED: Leaving OKB-134
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 추적되는 컨트롤러 지원, VR 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: CONFINED: Leaving OKB-134 is a Horror/Puzzle Adventure for PC and VR set in an abandoned soviet bunker. Reactivate power, lights and complex machinery. Learn about long-gone personnel, solve riddles and find a way to escape. But stay quiet! You’re not alone.
game.shortDescriptionEn: CONFINED: Leaving OKB-134 is a Horror/Puzzle Adventure for PC and VR set in an abandoned soviet bunker. Reactivate power, lights and complex machinery. Learn about long-gone personnel, solve riddles and find a way to escape. But stay quiet! You’re not alone.
